Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8000. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7200. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, so don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
